description: From the participle stem of Latin venditare, frequentative of vendere (“to sell”).

verbs.description: venditate (third-person singular simple present venditates, present participle venditating, simple past and past participle venditated)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, transitive) To exhibit, as though for sale; to show off.
examples: We brag and venditate our own works, and scorn all others in respect of us  […]
